What is Florida No-Fault?

Florida No-Fault (also known as Personal Injury Protection or PIP) are the benefits you pay for in your car insurance that pays (up to $10,000) for your medical benefits (at 80%) and lost wages (at 60%).

Read: https://t.co/xiUedniZRS

Call 813-755-9500 https://t.co/TqHOI8NJrb

What is Florida No-Fault?

Florida No-Fault (also known as Personal Injury Protection or PIP) are the benefits you pay for in your car insurance that pays (up to $10,000) for your medical benefits (at 80%) and lost wages (at 60%).

Read: https://t.co/xiUedniZRS

Call 813-755-9500 https://t.co/TqHOI8NJrb
